import{GET_ALL_SALONS,ADD_SALON}from"./types";import Axios from"axios";/* get all salons */export var getAllSalons=function getAllSalons(payload){return{type:GET_ALL_SALONS,payload:payload};};//get all salons from db
export function getAllSalonsFromApi(){console.log("ff");return function(dispatch){return Axios.get("http://localhost:4000/pro/getallsalons").then(function(res){console.log(res.data);dispatch(getAllSalons(res.data));});};}// add  salon
export var addsalon=function addsalon(payload){return{type:ADD_SALON,payload:payload};};//add salon to database
export function addsalontoDB(salon){console.log(salon);return function(dispatch){return Axios.post("http://localhost:4000/pro/addsalon",salon).then(function(res){return dispatch(addsalon(res.data));});};}//Update salon
export function updateSaloninDB(id,salon){return function(){return Axios.put("http://localhost:4000/pro/update/"+id,salon).then(function(res){return console.log("salon deja mis a jour");});};}
